participant_abstract.sent: I had to present remote controls around at the moment and discuss and encourage discussion about what we thought was good and bad about them, as well as what we could create within our budget and from what our surveys told us.
An initial shape and material were decided on.
More information is to be sought through market surveys.

Possibly different covers are to be made. we want speech recognition.
